definition[0]: an object that is convertible can be folded or arranged in a different way so that it can be used as something else
definition[1]: able to be exchanged for the money of another country
definition[2]: a financial document such as an insurance arrangement or a bond that is convertible can be exchanged for money, stocks etc
definition[3]: a car with a soft roof that you can fold back or remove
definition[4]: able to be changed from one thing to another
example[2]: The new preferred shares will be convertible immediately to common shares.
